app.title: Arbor - AI-Powered Writing Assistant
app.description: A local-first, AI-powered writing assistant for creative writers

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your Arbor preferences, themes, and integrations.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Choose how Arbor looks to you. Select a single theme, or sync with your system and automatically switch between day and night themes.

language.label: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the Arbor interface.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys for AI integrations. All keys are encrypted at rest.

openai.label: OpenAI API Key
openai.description: Your OpenAI API key for GPT models. Get one at platform.openai.com

anthropic.label: Anthropic API Key
anthropic.description: Your Anthropic API key for Claude models. Get one at console.anthropic.com

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Configure connection URLs and service endpoints. These settings use sensible defaults that work out of the box.

redisUrl.label: Redis URL
redisUrl.description: Redis connection URL for caching and sessions

ollamaBaseUrl.label: Ollama Base URL
ollamaBaseUrl.description: Ollama server URL for local LLM inference

configuration.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this to the default value?

masterKey.label: Master Encryption Key
masterKey.description: This key is used to encrypt sensitive settings like API keys. It is automatically generated and stored securely in the database.
masterKey.warning: ⚠️ Keep this key secure. If lost, you will need to re-enter all encrypted settings.

about.title: About Arbor
about.description: A local-first, AI-powered writing assistant with hierarchical node-based data model.

coldStart.title: Welcome to Arbor
coldStart.description: Let's get everything set up for you.

warmStart.title: Starting Arbor
warmStart.description: Checking services and preparing your workspace.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome to your Arbor dashboard. This is where you'll see an overview of your projects, recent activity, and quick actions.

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.description: Chat with AI to brainstorm ideas, get writing suggestions, and collaborate on your content.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search across all your notes, projects, and content.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Browse and manage your writing projects. Each project can contain folders and notes in a hierarchical structure.
projects.noProjectsDescription: Get started by creating your first project.

createDialog.title: Create New Project
createDialog.description: Create a new writing project to organize your work.
createDialog.name: Project Name

deleteDialog.title: Delete Project
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

fileTree.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This cannot be undone.
fileTree.confirmDeleteWithChildren: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}" and all its contents? This cannot be undone.
fileTree.emptyProject: This project is empty. Create a folder or note to get started.

createFolder.title: Create Folder
createFolder.description: Create a new folder to organize your notes.
createFolder.name: Folder Name
